install.name: RSForm! Pro Module
install.author: RSJoomla
install.description: This module is used to display forms created with RSForm! Pro. Works with at least RSForm! Pro 1.3.0 REV30!

param.name: formId
param.label: Form id
param.description: The ID of the Form. You can find it in your Manage Forms screen (the last column).

field.name: formId
field.label: Form id
field.description: The ID of the Form. You can find it in your Manage Forms screen (the last column).
